 I. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נָשַׁק‎</span> **verb** ==kiss== (Late Hebrew ***id.***, Assyrian <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***našâku***</u></abbr>, [[BDB#Tg|ᵑ7]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נְשֵׁיק‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נְשַׁק‎</span>, Syriac <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, ***kiss*** (originally ***smell*** [<img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">] according to [[BDB#Lag|Lag]]<sup>Nov.Psalt.Spec.24f.</sup>): Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> is ***fasten together, arrange in order***, Ethiopic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> participle ***ordine dispositus, apte sertus*** [[BDB#Di|Di]]<sup>641, pos. akin to II.</sup> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נשׁק‎</span>); — 

**Qal** ***Perfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נ‎</span> [[1Kgs.19.18|1Kgs 19:18]]; [[2Sam.15.5|2Sam 15:5]] 3 feminine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נָָֽשְׁקָה‎</span> [[Prov.7.13|Prov 7:13]] 3 plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נָשָׁ֑קוּ‎</span> [[Ps.85.11|Ps 85:11]] ***Imperfect*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יִּשַּׁק‎</span> [[Gen.41.40|Gen 41:40]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיִּשַּׁק‎</span> [[Gen.27.27|Gen 27:27]] +; suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יִשָּׁקֵ֫נִי‎</span> [[Song.1.2|Song 1:2]] 1 singular cohortative <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֶשֳּׁקָהֿ‎</span> [[1Kgs.19.20|1Kgs 19:20]] 3 masculine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יִשָּׁק֑וּן‎</span> [[Hos.13.2|Hos 13:2]], etc.; ***Imperative*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וּשֲׁקָה‎</span> [[Gen.27.26|Gen 27:26]] ***Infinitive construct*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נְשָׁקֿ‎</span> [[2Sam.20.9|2Sam 20:9]] — ***kiss***, usually with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לְ‎</span> person: [[Gen.27.26|Gen 27:26]]; [[Gen.27.29|Gen 27:29]]; [[Gen.50.1|Gen 50:1]]; [[Exod.4.27|Exod 4:27]] (all [[BDB#J|J]]), [[Gen.48.10|Gen 48:10]]; [[Exod.18.7|Exod 18:7]] (both [[BDB#E|E]]), [[2Sam.15.5|2Sam 15:5]]; [[2Sam.14.33|2Sam 14:33]]; [[2Sam.19.40|2Sam 19:40]]; [[2Sam.20.9|2Sam 20:9]]; [[2Sam.1.20|2Sam 1:20]];    so of idol-worship [[1Kgs.19.18|1Kgs 19:18]] (compare [[BDB#We|We]]<sup>Skizzen iii. 105</sup>; Heid. 109), compare <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַתִּשַּׁק יָדִי לְפִי‎</span> [[Job.31.27|Job 31:27]] ***and my hand hath kissed my mouth***; rarely with accusative of person [[1Sam.20.41|1Sam 20:41]] (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אִישׁ‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֶתרֵֿעֵהוּ‎</span>), suffix person [[1Sam.10.1|1Sam 10:1]] Canticles (+ <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִגְּשִׁיקוֺת‎</span>), [[Song.8.1|Song 8:1]] also [[Gen.33.4|Gen 33:4]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַֹיִֹּשָֹּׁקֵֹהֹוֹּ‎</span> ([[BDB#J|J]]; [[BDB#Holz|Holz]] [[BDB#E|E]]; word suspicious, [[BDB#Di|Di]] rejects); <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עֲגָלִים יִשּׁ‎</span> [[Hos.13.2|Hos 13:2]] ***claves do they kiss***; <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שְׁפָתַיִם יִשָּׁ֑ק‎</span> [[Prov.24.26|Prov 24:26]] ***lips he kisses***; absolute [[Ps.85.11|Ps 85:11]] (figurative, reciprocal) . — <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַלפִּֿיךָ יִשַּׁק‎</span> [[Gen.41.40|Gen 41:40]] is dubious, [[BDB#Di|Di]]. 'to thy mouth all my people shall yield' (fit, adapt themselves, compare Arabic √), so [[BDB#Kau|Kau]] [[BDB#Buhl|Buhl]]<sup>Lex</sup>, but this meaning uncertain, and text perhaps corrupt, see [[BDB#Di|Di]] [[BDB#Holz|Holz]]). **Pi\`el** ***Imperfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיְנַשֵּׁק‎</span> [[Gen.32.1|Gen 32:1]]; [[Gen.45.15|Gen 45:15]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיְנַשֶּׁקֿ‎</span> [[Gen.29.13|Gen 29:13]] ***Imperative*** masculine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נַשְּׁקוּֿ‎</span> [[Ps.2.12|Ps 2:12]] ***Infinitive construct*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נַשֵּׁק‎</span> [[Gen.31.28|Gen 31:28]] — ***kiss*** = **Qal**: with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לְ‎</span> person [[Gen.29.13|Gen 29:13]]([[BDB#J|J]]), [[Gen.31.28|Gen 31:28]]; [[Gen.32.1|Gen 32:1]]; [[Gen.45.15|Gen 45:15]] (all [[BDB#E|E]]); <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נַשְּׁקובַֿר‎</span> [[Ps.2.12|Ps 2:12]] is dubious, compare I. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בַּר‎</span> a above **Hiph\`il** ***Participle*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מַשִּׁיקוֺתּ‎</span> [[Ezek.3.13|Ezek 3:13]] of wings of cherubim, ***gently touching*** each other (with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֶלֿ‎</span>). 



 II. [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נָשַׁק‎</span>] **verb** exact meaning uncertain; probably either ==handle==, or ==be equipped with== (compare perhaps Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> etc., below I. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נשׁק‎</span>); — only **Qal** ***Participle*** plural construct <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נשְׁקֵי‎</span>: — <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קֶשֶׁת‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נ‎</span> [[1Chr.12.2|1Chr 12:2]] ***equipped with the bow***, so [[2Chr.17.17|2Chr 17:17]] (+ <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מָגֵן‎</span>); <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רוֺמֵי קֶשֶׁת‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נ‎</span> [[Ps.78.9|Ps 78:9]] is difficult, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ר‎</span> appositive of <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נ‎</span> according to [[BDB#Hup|Hup-Now]] [[BDB#Bae|Bae]] and others ([[BDB#Ges|Ges]]<sup>«GKC:130e»§ 130e</sup>); strike out <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רוֺמֵי‎</span> as explanatory gloss [[BDB#Hup|Hup]] [[BDB#Hi|Hi]] [[BDB#Che|Che]] [[BDB#Kau|Kau]]; strike out ver. as gloss [[BDB#Hup|Hup]] [[BDB#Kau|Kau]] [[BDB#Bae|Bae]].
